(WarBarge is back, blah, blah, blah, I said the same crap last time)

Ares:


The Neo Decepticon stared at the robot, quickly identifying him as a  member 
of the Alliance.  "Crushing trash like you will be way to easy." he laughed, 
raising his laser rifle and firing off three shots at Perndabot's torso.
